entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 6. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming west 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
